name: Music Lanes
description:
Simply put, music at your fingertips.
Just tap to the rhythm of each instrument to play it as you build up the complete song.
Each song is unique, with different instruments and a different tempo.
It may not be easy at first, but it's fun and skill comes with practice. Give it a shot and see how good you are at this! Bring out the artist in you!

> How to play:
• Try to stay on beat and tap the correct lane when the incoming tiles reach the play area.
• Or just tap on the tiles when they reach the grey line, whichever is easier for you.
